description: Master the second semester of calculus. This course covers advanced integration techniques, applications like finding volumes, and the fascinating world of infinite series.

lessons.title: Advanced Integration Techniques
lessons.description: Integration by parts, trigonometric integrals, substitution, and partial fractions

lessons.title: Applications of Integration
lessons.description: Volumes of revolution, arc length, surface area, and work

lessons.title: Introduction to Differential Equations
lessons.description: Separable equations, slope fields, and exponential growth/decay

lessons.title: Sequences and Series
lessons.description: Convergence tests, geometric and arithmetic series, and Taylor polynomials

lessons.title: Power Series and Taylor Series
lessons.description: Power series representation, Taylor and Maclaurin series, and convergence
